Uses of Package
jalse.actions

  • Packages that use jalse.actions 
    Package Description
    jalse
    This is the JALSE parent package.
    jalse.actions
    This package is for scheduling and managing Action (like Runnable but with a ActionContext and potentially associated actor).
    jalse.entities
    This package is for creating and storing Entity within EntityContainer.
  • Classes in jalse.actions used by jalse 
    Class and Description
    Action
    Action is the JALSE equivalent of Runnable.
    ActionEngine
    An engine for scheduling Action for execution.
    ActionScheduler
    This is the JALSE equivalent to Executor.
    DefaultActionScheduler
    A ActionScheduler implementation that schedules all actions against the supplied actor.
    MutableActionBindings
    A mutable extension of ActionBindings.
    MutableActionContext
    A mutable extension of ActionContext.
  • Classes in jalse.actions used by jalse.actions 
    Class and Description
    AbstractActionEngine
    An abstract implementation of ActionEngine that is designed to be used with ExecutorService.
    AbstractFutureActionContext
    An abstract implementation of MutableActionContext that is designed to be used with ExecutorService.
    AbstractManualActionContext
    A abstract implementation of MutableActionContext that is designed to be used manually.
    Action
    Action is the JALSE equivalent of Runnable.
    ActionBindings
    An immutable key-value bindings for ActionEngine (keys are strings).
    ActionContext
    ActionContext is supplied when running every Action.
    ActionEngine
    An engine for scheduling Action for execution.
    ActionScheduler
    This is the JALSE equivalent to Executor.
    ForkJoinActionEngine
    An implementation of ActionEngine based on ForkJoinPool.
    ForkJoinActionEngine.ForkJoinContext
    Fork join context.
    ManualActionEngine.ManualContext
    Manual action context.
    ManualWorkQueue
    A thread-safe queue for AbstractManualActionContext using the estimated perform time ( AbstractManualActionContext.getEstimated()).
    MultiActionBuilder
    An Action builder for creating Actions that chain, schedule or await other actions.
    MutableActionBindings
    A mutable extension of ActionBindings.
    MutableActionContext
    A mutable extension of ActionContext.
  • Classes in jalse.actions used by jalse.entities 
    Class and Description
    Action
    Action is the JALSE equivalent of Runnable.
    ActionEngine
    An engine for scheduling Action for execution.
    ActionScheduler
    This is the JALSE equivalent to Executor.
    DefaultActionScheduler
    A ActionScheduler implementation that schedules all actions against the supplied actor.
    MutableActionContext
    A mutable extension of ActionContext.
